title: Impudence does not pay
creator_credit: Bruno I. Botige and Progress Film
brief_description: A black and white silhouette film for children telling the story of a gorilla who steals his hunter’s rifle and helmet, after an exciting episode, and then taunts the other animals, even riding on a lion’s back. Finally they can bear it no longer and toss him from his hammock into the open jaws of a crocodile Music only
